com.cubeia.firebase.api.mtt
Interface MttInstance

All Superinterfaces:
Identifiable
public interface MttInstance
extends Identifiable

A tournament instance. An instance represents a concrete tournament and encapsulates event specific data.

getId
 

Method Detail

getState

MTTState getState()
Returns:
The state holder for this tournament instance

getScheduler

Scheduler<MttAction> getScheduler()
Returns:
The action scheduler for this instance.

getLobbyAccessor

LobbyAttributeAccessor getLobbyAccessor()
Returns:
An accessor for the lobby attribute bound to this instance

getTableLobbyAccessor

LobbyAttributeAccessor getTableLobbyAccessor(int tableId)
Retrieve a table attribute accessor. This method only accesses table for the current tournament. If a table does not belong to the tournament or if the table cannot be found, null will be returned.

Parameters:
tableId - Table id for which to get an accessor
Returns:
An accessor for the lobby table, or null if not found

getServiceRegistry

ServiceRegistry getServiceRegistry()
Returns:
The service registry for the server

getSystemPlayerRegistry

TournamentPlayerRegistry getSystemPlayerRegistry()
This is a shortcut for retrieving the player registry. This registry should be used to inform the system of tournaments a player is registered in.

Returns:
The system tournament registry, never null

getTableCreator

MttTableCreator getTableCreator()
Returns:
The table creator for the tournament instance, never null

getMttNotifier

MttNotifier getMttNotifier()
Returns:
The notifier for the instance, never null
